attributes.additional_details:
Unemployed people that claim benefits should have to earn them. why do they get money for nothing?
I think if they get £40 a week benefit for not having a job, they should do 6 hours work in their community for it. it works out at roughly minimum wage. after all its their community paying for them to live in it.
if this work is refused then they should have their benefits cut and partially paid in food stamps.
